<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pact of Infernal Prowess](/Feats.aspx?ID=3826) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 167</row>

**Archetype** [Pactbinder](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=189)

**Prerequisites**
[Pactbinder Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3822)

</column>

---

You've sworn a pact with [devils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30), granting you success in life in exchange for your soul in the afterlife. Once per hour, when you critically fail a check, you can reroll the check as a free action; this is a [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76) effect. Additionally, you can choose to automatically succeed at checks to [Earn Income](/Actions.aspx?ID=23) for tasks below your level, without rolling.

 However, when you die, your soul is consigned to [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=18). You can't be returned to life except by powerful magic such as [_miracle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=196), and even then, the devils responsible for the contract can track your every move for 1 year. The devils gain the effects of a [_discern location_](/Spells.aspx?ID=75) spell. They can also use 10th-level [_scrying_](/Spells.aspx?ID=268) on you at will, and you automatically critically fail your saving throw.

**Special** You can't retrain out of a Pact of Infernal Prowess without journeying to Hell and destroying the devil's written contract spelling out the terms of your pact.
name: Pact of Infernal Prowess
